price: Ababangikanyamana, ntibigeze baha namba Imana Allah icubahiro kiyikwiye mu kuyibangikanya n’ibiremwa, mu gihe ari Yo Nyenubushobozi; isi yose ku musi w’izuka izoba iri mu gipfunsi cayo; amajuru na yo azingwazingwe akonywakonywerezwe mu kuryo kwayo. Nihaninahazwe rero Imana Allah, Yongere Ihabwe n’icubahiro nta ngere mu buryo burengeye cane ivyo ababangikanyamana bayibangikanya;
arabic: وَمَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ جَمِيعٗا قَبۡضَتُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ مَطۡوِيَّٰتُۢ بِيَمِينِهِۦۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

meta.transliteration: wamā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi wal-arḍu jamīʿan qabḍatuhu yawma al-qiyāmati wal-samāwātu maṭwiyyātun biyamīnihi sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
